scripts.build: uglifyjs js/bundle.js -o build/bundle.min.js --comments '/^\!|^@preserve|^@cc_on|\bMIT\b|\bMPL\b|\bGPL\b|\(c\)|License|Copyright/' -c -m; uglifyjs js/app.js -o build/app.min.js -c -m; cat css/*.css | cleancss -o build/app.min.css
scripts.bundle: browserify -r iscroll -r js-base64 -i buffer -r moment-timezone -o js/bundle.js
